title: Medieval type fonts?
content:
Client needs more t-shirts and sweaters made but can't, for the life of him, remember the name of the fonts he used before. Spent the whole day yesterday searching for them and am now hoping that someone knows the names of these. Any help is greatly appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [kutting edge](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010121856/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-18%20at%201.33.12%20PM.png) | 1.21 MB |
author: jennmertle

comments.content: THANK YOU BOTH SO MUCH!!!!!! I wish I could give you a hug right about now!!!!
